ARABIC: كَلَّآ إِنَّ كِتَٰبَ ٱلْفُجَّارِ لَفِى سِجِّينٍ

ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: No indeed! The book of the dissolute is in Sijjin.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: Indeed the ledger of the wicked will be in (the lowest depths) Sijjin.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: No indeed! Verily the deeds of the wicked are in the Record locked up in the prison-house!
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: Woe to them! Let them know that the records of the sinner's deeds are in Sijin.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: Indeed, the record of the disbelievers is in the lowest place, the Sijjeen.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: Nay! Truly, the Record of the wicked is in Sijjin.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: Nay! most surely the record of the wicked is in the Sijjin.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: No indeed; the Book of the libertines is in Sijjin;
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: Nay, but the record of the vile is in Sijjin -
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: Indeed! The record of the wicked is in the Sijjin --
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: By no means! Verily the record of the ungodly is in Sijjin.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: Indeed, the record of the vicious is in Sijjeen.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: Nay! Surely the record of the wicked is (preserved) in Sijjin.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: Nay! Truly, the Record (writing of the deeds) of the Fujjar (disbelievers, sinners, evil-doers and wicked) is (preserved) in Sijjin.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: No indeed, the Book of the immoral is in Sijjeen.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: Not at all. The record of the wicked is in Sijjeen.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: No! Indeed, the record of the wicked is in sijjeen.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [83:7] Nay!, verily, the record of the profligates, that is to say, the record of the deeds of the disbelievers, is in Sijjīn — this is said to be a book containing [the record of] all the deeds of the devils and the disbelievers; but it is also said to be a location in the lowermost part of the seventh earth, the place of Satan and his hosts.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: (Nay) truly, Muhammad, (but the record of the vile) the works of the disbelievers (is in Sijjin
